comments.body: do we use this? if so, this will no longer decode in the same way

the docker REST API is returning `ID` but the docker client fails to decode it apparently, we don't use or reference this field ourselves.

details in : https://github.com/moby/moby/pull/40475

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@// ContainerExecInspect holds information returned by exec inspect.
type ContainerExecInspect struct {
	ExecID      string `json:"ID"`
	ContainerID string
	Running     bool
